# BuckyDrop

## Overview

**Type:** Dropshipping fulfillment platform
**Relationship:** Primary supplier for Dress Like Mommy
**Status:** Active

## Contact

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| Support Contact | Scott Buckydrop |
| WhatsApp | +86 158 2758 0519 |
| Response Time | Usually same day |

## Services Used

- 1688/Taobao product sourcing
- Quality inspection
- International shipping (YunExpress route preferred)
- Shopify integration

## Workflow

1. Find product on 1688
2. Add to BuckyDrop via browser extension
3. Set variants and pricing
4. Push to Shopify
5. Orders auto-sync for fulfillment

## Pricing Components

When calculating product cost, include ALL of:
- Product base price
- Domestic shipping (to BuckyDrop warehouse)
- BuckyDrop service fee
- International shipping (YunExpress to USA)

## Known Issues

- Sometimes slow to respond to support tickets
- Extension can be buggy with certain products
- Price updates need manual verification

## Alternatives Considered

- LovBuy (used ~3 years ago, switched away)
